title: Celebrating Friendsgiving
description:
Comedian and actor Nicol Paone always loved classic holiday movies, but she never saw LGBTQ people represented in films the way she wanted. So after she and fellow friend and actress Malin Akerman went through particularly tough break-ups, they decided to make their own holiday comedy called, "Friendsgiving.”

Follow Nicol Paone: @nicolpaone 

Watch the trailer for Friendsgiving here: Friendsgiving Movie Trailer
